Posts.Content: Nov 3, 2010 06:02AM kelly111 wrote: This is my first post.  I had a mastectomy on 10/27.  The camisoles w/ the pockets are amazing.  You step into them instead of putting them over your head which has been a huge help.  You will feel more mobile.  My surgeon's nurse wrote a prescription for them.  Mine are covered by insurance.  Just something that you may want to look into.
Posts.Title: Camisoles jan508 kelly111
